description:
strconv: add []byte Parse variants to minimize allocations

For discussion? Was fun.

Fixes issue 2632

messages.text:
On Tue, Mar 6, 2012 at 11:10 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> 2632 is marked Later.
> We are not adding new APIs now.
>

Well aware.


> I did not look at the code.


That's fine.  It was just fun to write.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

2632 is marked Later.
We are not adding new APIs now.
I did not look at the code.

Russ

subject: code review 5759057: strconv: add []byte Parse variants to minimize allocations
